name: Brutal World online - 2D Survival MMORPG with open world (Early Access, for Android)
name_original: Brutal World online - 2D Survival MMORPG with open world (Early Access, for Android)
description:
Brutal World online - 2D Survival MMORPG with open world (Early Access, for Android)

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=online.brutalworld

Protect the world from crazy creatures, angry demons, and hungry monsters that trying to destroy it.

Explore the world, kill the monsters, build facilities, cook food, eat, modify the world.

Currently it is in Early Access and available for Android. In the future it will be available for PC and WebBrowser

Try it for free! No ads, no boringness, play with your friends online, grow the community!

Support the project at patreon

Discord channel
